item.title: Introducing GitHub Linguist
item.description: The files and directories within a repository determine the languages that make up the repository. With GitHub, you can view a repository’s languages to get a quick overview of the repository. But how does this happen? What powers this repository language overview? In this article I would: Introduce you to GitHub Linguist How it works How to fix common Linguist issues How to use gitattributesto override Linguist :) How to use Emacs or Vim modelines to override Linguist How to contribute to GitHub Linguist Let’s Roll!
